text: Lewinella antarctica is a Gram-negative, obligately aerobic and chemoheterotrophic bacterium from the genus of Lewinella which has been isolated from coastal seawater from the Antarctic. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Lewinella antarctica at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 2009
title: Lewinella antarctica
